text: Omega Chi Epsilon (or ΩΧΕ, sometimes simplified to OXE) is an American honor society for chemical engineering students. The first chapter was formed at the University of Illinois in 1931. The second chapter was formed at the Iowa State University in 1932. The organization is a member of the Association of College Honor Societies. ==See also== * American Institute of Chemical Engineers ==References== ==External links== * (subpages also referenced) * ACHS Omega Chi Epsilon entry * Omega Chi Epsilon chapter list at ACHS Category:Association of College Honor Societies Category:Engineering honor societies Category:Chemical engineering organizations Category:Student organizations established in 1931 Category:1932 establishments in Illinois
title: Omega Chi Epsilon
